Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Clayton-le-Moors, Accrington, Lancashire March contest - 1st Stalybidge, 2nd Meltham, 3rd Accrington. 5 bands competed.
Aug. 10, 2019, 3:12 p.m. Oct. 16, 2019, 10:53 a.m.
1 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band John Gladney Jnr Les Huguenots [unknown arranger]
2 Linthwaite Silver Band Edwin Swift William Tell [unknown arranger]
3 Kingston Mills Band John Gladney Jnr Le Prophete [unknown arranger]
4 Stalybridge Borough Richard Sourbutts Le Prophete [unknown arranger]
5 Accrington Old Charles Woodcock Les Huguenots [unknown arranger]
